title: If the area under DP reservation to be handed over to MCGM, (excluding the areas under DP roads/ road setback), is more than the land component of built up amenity required as per this Regulation, then the provision for amenity is not necessary
clause_text: If the area under DP reservation to be handed over to MCGM, (excluding the areas under DP roads/ road setback), is more than the land component of built up amenity required as per this Regulation, then the provision for amenity is not necessary.
section: Development of reservation in Redevelopment for Rehabilitation of Slum Dwellers under Regulation No. 33(10)
